statements: DELETE FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year = 2015
DELETE FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE model = 'Civic' AND vin = '1HGCM82633A004352'
DELETE FROM inventory_management WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM vehicle_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND vehicle_id IN (SELECT id FROM vehicle_details WHERE make = 'Toyota');
DELETE FROM vehicle_location WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND vehicle_id IN (SELECT id FROM vehicle_details WHERE year < 2010);
DELETE FROM vehicle_owner WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND vehicle_id IN (SELECT id FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota');
DELETE FROM vehicle_inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 AND price > 10000;
